howItWorks.heading: How MOSBUZZ Works
howItWorks.subheading: Start slow. Stay consistent. See label for guidance. For general wellness.

steps.title: Shake & drop
steps.text: Shake your bottle gently. Place 20 drops of Meso under your tongue. Pause, breathe, and feel your inner system respond.

steps.title: Tune in & notice
steps.text: Let Meso's subtle frequency guide you inward. Notice sensations, thoughts, and shifts in your mood or focus. This is your meso-moment of awareness.

steps.title: Capture & share
steps.text: Record a short clip of your mesodosing ritual - your calm, your clarity, your creativity. Keep it real. Some days flow, others feel heavier - that's part of the process. We love the truth.
